properties.title: Tamina thermal spring Bad Ragaz
properties.abstract: The spa in Bad Ragaz has been well known since the early Middle Ages and is still considered the most plenteous aquatic spa in Europe. Switch off and recharge your batteries.
properties.description:
The healing powers of the Tamina spring water are legendary and the first bathing treatments that were offered over 600 years ago will never be forgotten thanks to some impressive drawings. In those days the patients were wrapped in a towel and lowered by rope into the Tamina gorge and the warm thermal spring water. 

In today’s spa in Bad Ragaz, well-being is the top priority. The architecture alone creates a unique and inspirational atmosphere. The relaxation spa on 8300m² with various whirlpools, grottoes, steam baths, saunas, relaxation zones, solarium and an extensive range of massage and beauty treatments promises an unforgettable adventure for mind, body and soul.

The hot Tamina spring which bubbles up from the nearby gorge in the Old Bad Pfäfers is also a main attraction. The most extensive aquatic spa in Europe with water temperatures of 36.5 degrees Celsius provides the ultimate bathing experience.
